text: Klaske Meijer (born 23 June 1956) is a Dutch former long track speed skater, who was active between 1968 and 1983. She won the bronze medal at the junior national championships in 1973 and the next year the silver medal. She was trained by Wiebe Kort. In the mid-1970 she was one of the main Dutch speed skaters. Meijer had also good results at international races. She became a member of national team trained by Ab Krook. She competed at the Dutch Allround Championships in 1977, 1978 and 1980. == References == Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch speed skaters
title: Klaske Meijer
